cost.trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

Effect: Connection - Shadow Force. The triggering effect does not affect the user, and the user gains @Affliction[transient]. The user may consume a Simple Action to gain or lose @Affliction[transient] as it wishes.

actions.name: Holographic Dominion
actions.description: Passive: While @Affliction[transient], the user's Attacks deal twice as much damage, and gains 2 PP at the start of each of its Activations.
